text: is a Japanese football player. He plays for FC Tokyo in J1 League. == Club career == Ogawa joined FC Tokyo in 2016http://www.footballdatabase.eu/football.joueurs.ryoya.ogawa.284563.en.html footballdatabase.com and made his league debut against Vegalta Sendai on 6 March 2016.Ryoya Ogawa at soccerway.com.
